article: How to Whistle With Your Fingers
intro: Knowing how to whistle with your fingers can come in handy when you need to hail a cab or get someone’s attention. Whistling with your fingers can be tricky, but with a little practice, you'll be whistling loudly in no time!

steps.title: Blow air out through your fingers and lips.
steps.subtitle: Your exhale should be forceful, but don’t blow so hard that you hurt yourself. You may not hear a whistling sound the first few times you try it. After each attempt, take in another deep breath and reseal your lips around your fingers. Keep trying and you'll eventually make a whistling sound!
sub-points: If you’re having trouble, try adjusting the angle of your fingers or changing how hard you’re blowing.
